mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELL_ITEM(SELL_NUMBER, SELL_IDNUMBER, SELL_FIELD, SELL_TITLE, SELL_CONTENT, SELL_PRICE) VALUES(SELL_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{sell_idNumber}, #{sell_field}, #{sell_title}, #{sell_content}, #{sell_price})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SELL_ITEM S FULL OUTER JOIN JDFILE_UPLOAD F ON S.SELL_NUMBER = F.FILE_BID
